string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FIRE_DESC
string.body: Rough, wild and aggressive by nature, their harsh surroundings toughened the bodies of these people, and they have also gained the power of Fire from the elements.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EARTH_DESC
string.body: A race consisting solely of males since the times of Ancient Elyos, they have obtained the power of Earth following the Cataclysm and have solid and unshakable strength.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WIND_DESC
string.body: Prolonged isolation has led to a highly developed culture for this race. They possess great agility as well as endurance and like to amuse themselves with adventures and hunts.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_LIGHT_DESC
string.body: A race that inherited the most from Ancient Elyos in terms of appearance, they are a proud people who believe they are the Chosen ones as they resemble the Elyos and were mostly spared during the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WATER_DESC
string.body: They are a race of females who possess the greatest intellectual power among all races, and their evolution sacrificed much of their physical attributes in exchange for the ability to use magic at will.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WARRIOR
string.body: Warriors specialize in close combat, utilizing their great physical strength and prowess with melee weapons. Once a Warrior reaches a certain level of proficiency, they must choose the way of the Gladiator or the Templar.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SCOUT
string.body: Scouts concern themselves with speed, agility, and awareness. They wear leather armor, making them vulnerable, so they specialize in hit and run tactics. A Scout will eventually become a Ranger or an Assassin.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CLERIC
string.body: Priests use divine power to heal and to bolster the defenses of their allies. They can use both long-range spells and melee attacks to deliver pain to the enemy. Clerics must choose between the path of a Chanter or a Cleric.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_MAGE
string.body: Mages delight in dealing awe-inspiring levels of damage. Their command over the elements is terrifying, but they are relatively vulnerable so they must be clever to survive. Mages may choose the school of the Sorcerer or the Spiritmaster.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_INVAILD_CHARACTERNAME
string.body: The name you have entered is not allowed. Please enter another name.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CHOICE_CHARACTER_DELETE_CONFIRM
string.body: Are you sure you want to delete this character?

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_TIZERID
string.body: Traditionally famous for its mighty knights, this northern country is regarded as a powerful military state, but the barren lands and primitive state of its industries have left the country lagging furthest behind in terms of economy and wealth.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FESRA
string.body: An eastern nation composed of several tribes, where the central government is weak and the tribal lifestyle is still maintained and emphasized. There exists agriculture and livestock farming industries based on its lush forests, but most of the produce go into feeding its citizens.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EROLE
string.body: A nation located on the west of the Tower of Light, where the life of abstinence and celibacy is seen as ideal. A country full of devout priests of Aion, which also has the most developed economy thanks to a blessed environment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_JUHDENIL
string.body: Developed by highly intellectual Water Elyos, this lowland country in the south boasts powerful magic and a high level of academia. It is where every Elyos who dreams of becoming a Sorcerer gathers from all over the world.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_RACE_NOT_READY
string.body: The selected Race is still being prepared.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT2
string.body: Let's use a Combo. A skill is blinking on the Quickbar. This skill is used to activate the Chain Skill. Using skills in the order indicated by the arrow allows you to defeat enemies with overwhelming striking power.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT4
string.body: Let's use a special attack. Select a target and use a special attack by clicking the skill indicated by the arrow on the skill window or on the Quickbar. With the special attack assistance skill, you can also transfer your DP to any group member who uses a special attack.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_SELF
string.body:
Your account has been suspended upon your request in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official support website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_SELF_AUTH_EXPECTED
string.body:
Until your account has been confirmed with your real name, you cannot use the Aion service.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official support website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account requires Personal Authentication.

Please complete the personal authentication process on the PlayNc official website (www.plaync.co.kr) according to the process.

For more information, please use the 1:1 Petition on the PlayNc official website (www.plaync.co.kr).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You used other's identity to create your account.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official support website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement because you fraudulently used someone else's payment information.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (www.Aion.co.kr or Aion.plaync.co.kr) or by calling the customer center [1600-0020 (Extension Number 5): Within Korea].

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used the game service for commercial purposes.

For more information, please open a support ticket on the NCSOFT website (http://us.ncsoft.com/en/support/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement. You used illegal software in the game which is not permitted.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement. You used illegal software in the game which is not permitted.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 10 days because of the use of illegal software. A repeated violation in the future may lead to a permanent termination of your account.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (www.Aion.co.kr or Aion.plaync.co.kr).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_7
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You traded or tried to trade items or characters (accounts) of the game with cash, commodities, or items of another game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_30
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 30 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You traded or tried to trade items or characters (accounts) of the game with cash, commodities, or items of another game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You traded or tried to trade items or characters (accounts) of the game with cash, commodities, or items of another game more than 3 times.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_30
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 30 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You traded or tried to trade items or characters (accounts) of the game with cash, commodities, or items of another game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You traded or tried to trade items or characters (accounts) of the game with cash, commodities, or items of another game more than 2 times.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_AGAIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You reported a false incident or interfered with the operation of the game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You traded or tried to trade accounts with others.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement and the company's operation policy. You used another's personal information illegally or without permission.

You can check the details through the email that was sent to your email address you registered with the company.

If you do not have any direct relationship with the account theft, you can submit a protest letter to the account theft report center (Aion) in the PlayNC website (http://us.ncsoft.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_LIE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with our policy on handling account theft reports because you reported a false account theft incident.

Reporting a false account theft incident to the account theft report center may cause harm to other people.

For more information about the account suspension, contact on the PlayNC website (http://us.ncsoft.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because your account theft report was determined to be false as you didn't confirm your identity within 7 days after the account theft report.

But, if you confirm your identity within 30 days after the report, we will proceed with the investigation of your report normally. So, please do so at the customer center on the PlayNC website (http://us.ncsoft.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You committed or tried to commit an act that obstructs public safety or goes against the social order (fraud).

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_7
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You committed or tried to commit an act that obstructs public safety or goes against the social order (fraud).

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You committed or tried to commit an act that obstructs public safety or goes against the social order (fraud).

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You commiteed indecent acts in the game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_30
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 30 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement and the company's operation policy. You participated in advertising, supporting, or assisting improper game play in the game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You commiteed indecent acts in the game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement and the company's operation policy because you used illegal software, which is not permitted.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (www.Aion.co.kr or Aion.plaync.co.kr).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement because you either abused the system or directly affected the game in a wrongful way.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (www.Aion.co.kr or Aion.plaync.co.kr).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_LIGHT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement because you either abused the system or directly affected the game in a wrongful way.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (www.Aion.co.kr or Aion.plaync.co.kr).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_SERIOUS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement because you either abused the system or directly affected the game in a wrongful way.

Abuse of bugs can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the balance of the game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_OBSTRUCT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You committed or tried to commit an act that obstructs public safety or goes against the social order.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_LANGUAGE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because of your use of foul language.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM_BUT_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement and the company's operation policy because you used illegal software, which is not permitted.

For more information, contact us by using the 1:1 Petition on the Aion official website (www.Aion.co.kr or Aion.plaync.co.kr).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PRETEND_INSIDER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement. You were found to have impersonated a game master (GM), an employee of the company, or the company itself.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you are suspected of using inappropriate methods to play the game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BUNDLE
string.body:
Multiple accounts registered with your RRN (Resident Registration Number) have been suspended because it was confirmed that the accounts were in violation of the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ETC
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you breached the Aion game service agreement or the company's operation policy.

For more information about the account suspension, contact us by visiting the Aion support website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_EXTERNAL_REQUEST
string.body: Your account has been suspended by an official request from a law enforcement agency. This action was taken because an official request from such a body has legal implications. For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_UNPAIED
string.body: Your account has been suspended because you have not made a recent payment. Please pay the outstanding amount, and then confirm by visiting the Aion support site (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DETOUR_IP
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you are suspected of using someone else's identity without permission.

If you have not committed this act, complete the authorization process on the Aion home page to resume using the service.

For more information, contact us via the 1:1 Petition at the customer center (Aion) on the NCSOFT website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

Log into your NC Account (www.ncsoft.com) and click the 'ADD GAME' button next to the Aion logo.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ALL
string.body:
New players cannot create characters on that server.
If you already have a character on that server, you may create additional characters of the same race.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ONE
string.body: Race creation restrictions are in place. You cannot create an %1 on the %0 server unless you already have at least one %1 character there.

string.name: STR_BLOCK_PC_ROOM_COMPLAIN
string.body:
We store all account information and logs.
We have received a report that you logged into Aion from an internet cafe and deliberately left without paying.
Using an internet cafe without the intention or ability to pay for the service is theft, and, as such, is a violation of the law.
If you had nothing to do with this act, please contact us.
You can contact us any time on our toll-free customer service line, (866) 367-9516, or on the official website, http://us.ncsoft.com/support, to find out more details.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_SELF
string.body: All game services using this account have been suspended upon your request.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used unauthorized software in the game.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used unauthorized software in the game.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 10 days because you used unauthorized software in the game.
Your account will be permanently terminated if the same violation occurs again. For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account was involved in account trading. All game services using the account have been suspended.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used another's payment information fraudulently.
For more information, contact our customer center at (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used another's identity to create your account.
If this is not the case, verify your identity through our website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used the game service for commercial purposes.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_BOARDER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you regularly made posts on official NCSOFT websites that were in violation of the End User License Agreement.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIOLATION
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you were involved in illegal activity while using the game service.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_COIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the End User License agreement. You were involved in an unauthorized use of NC Coins.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_FREE_COIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the End User License agreement. You were involved in an unauthorized use of NC Coins.
For more information, contact us using the support form on the official Aion website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you performed inappropriate activities that the plaync service doesn't allow in order to obtain undisclosed information or alter our game client.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIRUS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you were involved in the use or distribution of illegal software that can harm our services, other companies' services, or users' computers.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement. You used another's identity to create your account.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (http://us.ncsoft.com/support/).

string.body: You have exceeded the number of characters allowed per account, and must delete some characters before you can play. If you have transferred to a different server, please try logging in on the previous server, and then again on the new server.

string.body:
We store all account information and logs.
We have received a report that you logged into Aion from an internet cafe and deliberately left without paying.
Using an internet cafe without the intention or ability to pay for the service is theft, and, as such, is a violation of the law.
If you had nothing to do with this act, please contact us.
You can contact us any time on our toll-free customer service line, (866) 367-9516, or on the official website, http://us.ncsoft.com/support, to find out more details.

string.name: STR_ACCUSE_UPGRADE_1_LEVEL
string.body:
You have been placed under Lv. 1 Probation due to reports regarding your automated hunting. Continued reports against you will result in restrictions in your in-game items and XP.
Use the '/probationstatus' command to check your probation status and time remaining until probation is dropped.
Enter '%0' into the chat window after checking the status.

string.name: STR_ACCUSE_UPGRADE_2_LEVEL
string.body:
You have been placed under Lv. 2 Probation due to reports regarding your automated hunting. You now have limited XP, Kinah, AP, gatherable, and extracted item acquisition.
Use the '/probationstatus' command to check your probation status and time remaining until probation is dropped.
Enter '%0' into the chat window after checking the status.

string.name: STR_ACCUSE_UPGRADE_3_LEVEL
string.body:
You have been placed under Lv. 3 Probation due to reports regarding your automated hunting. You now have severely limited XP, Kinah, AP, gatherable, and extracted item acquisition, and can no longer acquire loot. You can no longer join groups or alliances.
Use the '/probationstatus' command to check your probation status and time remaining until probation is dropped.
Enter '%0' into the chat window after checking the status.

string.name: STR_ACCUSE_UPGRADE_4_LEVEL
string.body:
You have been placed under Lv. 4 Probation due to reports regarding your automated hunting. You can no longer acquire XP, Kinah, AP, gatherables, or extracted items, and can no longer join groups or alliance.
Use the '/probationstatus' command to check your probation status and time remaining until probation is dropped.
Enter '%0' into the chat window after checking the status.

string.name: STR_ACCUSE_DEGRADE_LEVEL
string.body:
Your probation level has dropped to Phase %num0 due to recorded hours of fair play.
Use the '/probationstatus' command to check your probation status and time remaining until probation is dropped.

string.name: STR_ACCUSE_DEGRADE_NORMAL_LEVEL
string.body:
Your probation has been dropped due to recorded hours of fair play.
Use the '/probationstatus' command to check your probation status and time remaining until probation is dropped.

string.name: STR_MSG_ERROR_REPORT_SEND_AGREE
string.body:

string.name: STR_NOTICE_MIXED_RACED_AFTER_SERVER_MERGE
string.body:
Aion was designed for players to play only one race per server. We have allowed you to play both Elyos and Asmodians on the same server due to a merging of servers on which your characters were located.


While you will be able to play your existing characters, you will be unable to create new characters on this server until you have only characters of the same race on the server.

1. To resolve the issue, transfer any characters of the opposite race to another server using a paid server transfer. Alternatively, delete all characters of one race. For additional information about paid server transfers please visit http://na.aiononline.com/en/store/account-services/.

2. Once only one race remains on the server, you will be able to create new characters of that race. You will not be able to create characters of the opposing race.

Thank you for your understanding.

Type OK to continue.

string.name: STR_FINAL_OVERDUE_MAIL_BODY
string.body:
You have an unpaid maintenance fee. According to the housing management policy, %2% will be impounded.

You can re-buy the impounded house from the auction.

Thank you for taking good care of %2% so far.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_HOUSING_BUILDING_CHANGE_CONFIRM
string.body:
Spend a Remodeling Ticket to acquire the selected exterior.

Accept?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_BUY_RANKITEM_CONFIRM
string.body: You may <font color="ff0000">be unable to use or equip some items in your purchase list depending on your Abyss Rank.</font> Are you sure you want to buy them?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_BUY_RANKITEM_WITH_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM
string.body: You may <font color="ff0000">be unable to use or equip some items in your purchase list depending on your Abyss Rank.</font> Alternatively, your Abyss Rank may <font color="ff0000">decrease</font>. Are you sure you want to buy them?

string.name: STR_COMPOUND_RANKITEM_ASK_CONFIRM
string.body: %1will be destroyed after combination. The Rank Limit of the combined item will also change. Do you want to combine the two items?

string.name: STR_TOYPET_H_ABANDON_PET_CONFIRM
string.body:
Once you part with the Sidekick, it will be deleted from the list and you cannot summon it again.

Are you sure you want to part with %0?

string.body: That cabinet is in storage at the Housing Warehouse.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_SCROLL_CONFIRM
string.body:
You chose to augment %1 to level %2 by spending %0.

You can only augment up to the item's maximum augment level allowed.

Continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_SCROLL_CONFIRM
string.body:
You chose to augment all eligible equipped items up to Level %1 by spending %0.

You can only augment up to the item's maximum augment level allowed.

Continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM
string.body: Pay %qina0 to magically charge all equipped items to their maximum levels. Do you really want to charge them?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS
string.body:
You chose to augment the registered item to Level %0.

You can only augment up to the item's maximum augment level allowed.

This will cost %qina1. Continue?

string.body: Magical Charging Effect on Combined Item (%0)

string.name: STR_MSG_SELECT_LBOX_OUTLET_OBJECT

string.body: To part with the Sidekick, enter '%0'.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM
string.body: If you charge the item with magical power, your Abyss rank will drop.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_USER_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM
string.body: If you charge the item with magical power, your Abyss rank may drop on the next charging.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %qina0 to augment all equipped items to the maximum level.

If the items charge, your Abyss Rank will drop. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %ap1 to augment the registered item to Level %0 or its maximum level, whichever is lower.

If the item charges, your Abyss Rank will drop. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM_USER_RANKDOWN
string.body:
You need %qina0 to augment all the equipped items to their maximum levels.

If the items charge, your Abyss Rank may drop next time. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS_USER_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %ap1 to augment the registered item to Level %0 or its maximum level, whichever is lower.

If the item charges, your Abyss Rank may drop next time. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DISRUPT_GAME_PLAY_3_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 3 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement because you made fraudulent use of someone else's identity.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL_7_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement because you either abused the system or directly affected the game in a wrongful way.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL_3_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 3 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Aion service agreement because you are suspected of using inappropriate methods to play the game.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_30_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 30 days because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game.

Abuse of bugs can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_1Y
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 1 year because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game.

Abuse of bugs can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies because it was confirmed that you have used improper language during gameplay.

For more information, contact us on the Aion official website (http://www.aiononline.com/).

string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 30 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies because it was confirmed that you have used improper language during gameplay.

After 10 days has passed, you can use the service normally once you go through the authorization process at the PlayNc homepage.

string.body:

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the PlayNc (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_ASK_PASS_BY_INVADE_DIRECT_PORTAL
string.body:
Do you want to infiltrate the enemy zone through the Dimensional Vortex?

This will automatically remove you from your current group/alliance

and and place you in an infiltration alliance.

string.name: STR_CONFIRM_INVADE_DIRECT_PORTAL_OUT
string.body:
You have left the battlefield.

Unless you return shortly, you will automatically quit the infiltration alliance

and be sent back home.

string.name: STR_ASK_INVADE_DIRECT_PORTAL_DEFENSE_FORCE
string.body:
You entered a defense area that the enemy has infiltrated.

Do you want to join the defense alliance?

You will automatically quit the alliance once you leave the defense area.

string.name: STR_GLOBAL_OPTION_DIALOG__NCPING_USER_AGREE
string.body:
NC Ping is a function that edits the set value of the operating system (registry) to improve communications between the Aion game client and server.

This function improves response times during the game.

However, if the NC Ping function is activated and Aion is being played, other programs can suffer in their network performance or even shut down.

Please refer to the NC Ping option explanation for more information.

string.body: Press Resume to continue upgrading.\nMay be used only once per play.

Do you want to proceed?

string.body: Purifiable at enchantment level %0 or above

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GACHA_REWARD_BUTTON
string.body: Press Reward to receive a prize\ncorresponding to the Upgrade Level.

string.name: STR_POPUP_GACHA_FEVERTIME_CHECK
string.body:
Upgrade Frenzy has begun!

May fortune favor you!

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GAME
string.body:
Upgrade Arcade

The Upgrade Arcade is easy and fun to play! Upgrade the weapon with 1 Arcade Token. The more you upgrade it, the higher grade reward you will receive!

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_LUCKY
string.body:
Frenzy Meter

As you use Arcade Tokens, your Frenzy Meter fills until...

Upgrade Frenzy!

When you reach 100 Frenzy Points, press Play as much as you can to receive even better rewards!

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_FAILURE
string.body:
Upgrade Failure

When an upgrade fails, you receive the lowest grade reward, so be careful!

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_BUTTON
string.body:
The Play and Reward Buttons

Press Play to upgrade the weapon. When you are satisfied with the Upgrade Level, press Reward to receive your prize.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_RETRY
string.body:
Resume

You can use Arcade Tokens to press Resume once per Play to restore your last successful Upgrade Level. The higher the Upgrade Level being restored, the more Upgrade Tokens it will take.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GRADE
string.body:
Rewards Panel

Click the arrow next to Rewards to reveal the prizes you can win. There are four possible grades. The higher Upgrade Level you attain, the better grade reward you will receive. Click Frenzy Rewards to reveal the prizes reserved for Upgrade Frenzy!

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_PETBUFF
string.body: Feed your pet Aether Cherries when it wears out to continue its cheering. Its appetite determines how many it needs.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABSOLUTEEXP_BODY

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 90 days because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game.

Abuse of bugs can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the PlayNC (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 90 days in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that violates public safety protocols or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at PlayNC (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_7

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_90_DAYS

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_SLAYER_LIGHT_G3_BODY
